About.paragraph: VSNT is designed to realize the realization of the ownership of digital currency assets more, starting with the Vassana Token investment system. Buy VSNT on the platform and place Stake Token on the platform. There will be cash prizes and an opportunity to participate in events with participating merchants that we will announce at a later date VSNT. It is designed for a greater awareness of the ownership of digital currency assets. Which applied blockchain technology
